import React, { Component } from "react"; import Link from "next/link"; import { API, graphqlOperation } from "aws-amplify"; import * as queries from "../src/graphql/queries"; const facility = props => ( <> {console.log({ ...props })}
Search for Facility:    
Shops
Unpaid (120) | Total (1000)
Attachments
Unpaid (120) | Total (1000)
Toilets
Unpaid (120) | Total (1000)
Banking Hall
Unpaid (120) | Total (1000)
Generator Rooms
Unpaid (120) | Total (1000)
POS Stands
Unpaid (120) | Total (1000)
); facility.getInitialProps = async function() { let nextToken = null; let results = []; do { raw = await API.graphql( graphqlOperation(queries.listFacilitys, { limit: 10000, nextToken: nextToken }) ); nextToken = raw.data.listFacilitys.nextToken; raw.data.listFacilitys.items.map(value => results.push(value)); } while (nextToken); return { data: results }; }; export default facility;
